title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new My New Post More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

title: Foxmail邮箱登录
content: 输入邮箱地址，密码，点击创建输入服务器地址如下行员服务器地址： 用户名后缀 12345.com12345mail.oa 勾选SSL 端口：99512345mail.oa 勾选SSL 端口：465 非行员地址： 用户名后缀 22222222222.oa 不勾选SSL 端口：1102222.oa2 不勾选SSL 端口：25 输入完成创建登陆。 (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer0"),"autoplay":true,"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":true,"lang":"zh-cn//语言","screenshot":true,"hotkey":true,"preload":"auto","volume":0.9,"video":{"url":"/Foxmail邮箱登录/01.mp4","pic":"/resources/images/scenery_three.jpeg"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})()
